__e: You wanted a hundred thousand francs... and I thought you wanted me.
But we've always been on the level, and I'd like to stay that way.
I came to tell you some news... to put you in the way of gaining 50,000 francs or even more.
Look pay me 35,000 francs for my car, and let's have a drink.
It will be 15 francs for one, 20 for two.
For 15 francs a month, I can choose any girl. That's all I need.
All in all, I make about 3000 francs a month.
Look, boss, I could keep you alive for 50 francs a week.
